q1.question: How does the AI work?
q1.answer: Our AI uses advanced natural language models to understand and answer customer questions contextually and personally. It continuously learns from each interaction.

q2.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q2.answer: Yes! There are no minimum contract periods. You can cancel your subscription at any time through the control panel, with no penalties or additional fees.

q3.question: How long does implementation take?
q3.answer: Basic implementation takes less than 24 hours. After registration, you'll receive a setup guide and your agent will be ready to start working quickly.

q4.question: Is my data secure?
q4.answer: Absolutely. We strictly follow GDPR and use end-to-end encryption. Your data is never shared with third parties and you maintain full control over it.

q5.question: Are there language limits?
q5.answer: Our agents support over 50 languages, including Portuguese, English, Spanish and Chinese. Language detection is automatic and responses happen in the customer's language.
